title: Sound On: Ukraine Tensions Spike, Gov Funding, Trump Deposition
itunes:title: Sound On: Ukraine Tensions Spike, Gov Funding, Trump Deposition
description:
Guests: Former Ambassador to Russia Thomas Pickering, Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick, Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media, and Frank Maisano, Senior Principal at Bracewell.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
